name: chat-js
description: Realtime Discord-style chat application with WebRTC voice communication

scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:all: npm run test && cd frontend && npm run e2e:run
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build 2>/dev/null || echo 'Backend build skipped' && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.docs:dependencies:all: npx madge backend/ frontend/src/ --image docs/full-dependency-graph.png --layout dot
scripts.reporting: npm run docs:dependencies:all && npm run docs:coverage && npm run docs:changelog && npm run docs:generate
scripts.ci:full: npm run quality:check && npm run test:all && npm run reporting && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend

author: Raer Lim
